title: Did Lawmakers Demand the Pentagon Disclose If It Developed Weaponized Ticks?
subtitle: A curious amendment to the 2020 Defense Authorization Act demands answers on the question of U.S.-developed insect bioweapons.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The U.S. House of Representatives voted to compel the Department of Defense to disclose if it ever used ticks as part of a biological weapons program.
